name: Lightnin' Hopkins
description: '''Samuel John''' "'''Lightnin''''" '''Hopkins''' (March 15, 1912 â€“ January 30, 1982) was an American [[country blues]] singer, songwriter, guitarist and occasional pianist from [[Centerville, Texas]]. In 2010, ''[[Rolling Stone]]'' magazine ranked him No. 71 on its list of the 100 greatest guitarists of all time.
